# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| >=4.5.x | :white_check_mark: |
| <4.5    | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

In case of any vulnerability please inform the [project owner maintainer](mailto:openbrokerapi@googlegroups.com)
We will respond with a couple of days.
